about_the_game:
Story

Onboard a space station traveling to colonize a distant planet, you awaken prematurely, surrounded by hundreds of cryosleep pods filled with beautiful girls. The station's mission has gone off-course, and now it's up to you to decide which girls to wake, how to interact with them, and whether or not to create a new kind of future together.

Each girl you choose to wake has her own unique personality, desires, and background. Form relationships, lead them into your bed, and face the consequences—because in Passioners, every girl can get pregnant. Build your ultimate space harem, filled with expectant mothers, but be careful—the future of humanity is in your hands.

Each choice matters. Form bonds, build trust, or dive into erotic adventures. But remember—your actions shape the journey, and your decisions will affect the fate of your relationships.

You Decide Who to Wake: Choose carefully which girls to bring out of cryosleep. Each one has different traits and personalities—make your selections wisely.

Romantic and Sexual Relationships: Develop deep connections with the girls and lead them into passionate encounters. All relationships can end in the bedroom if played right.

Pregnancy System: Every girl you sleep with can get pregnant, so beware of the consequences. How big will your cosmic harem of expecting girls become?

Explicit Scenes: Dive into uncensored, steamy action with all your favorite girls.

Intriguing Storyline: A mix of romance, mystery, and deep-space exploration that will keep you hooked.

Pregnancy and Harem

Every woman can become pregnant based on your interactions. Can you build and manage a harem of expectant lovers?

Unique Characters

Each woman has a distinct personality—be it shy, assertive, or seductive. Choose wisely who you wake and how you engage with them.

Freedom of Choice

It's your decision whether or not to wake each woman from her cryosleep. Create bonds, uncover secrets, and build a harem if you wish—but every action has lasting consequences.

Build Your Cosmic Harem

Manage relationships and pregnancies aboard the ship.

Hot Moments on Repeat: The Video Gallery

All your favorite steamy scenes are saved in a dedicated Video Gallery. Revisit your most erotic encounters, explore different choices, and enjoy the game’s most intense moments on your own terms. Each scene is available in high quality and ready for you to relive over and over.

For further immersion, the game offers cutting-edge animations and a dynamic space environment, making every choice feel like it has real stakes. Step aboard the ship, wake up the girls, and explore everything that Passioners has to offer!

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: PASSIONERS contains adult content. It features sexual themes, erotic scenes, nudity, sexual acts, and alcohol use. It does not contain drug abuse, self-harm, or suicide. Recommended for players aged 18 and above.

legal_notice: Passioners is a transformative work of fiction created for entertainment purposes. It does not intend to infringe upon any copyrights or intellectual property. All characters, settings, and narratives are entirely original. Any resemblance to real-life persons, organizations, or other works is purely coincidental.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: PASSIONERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Passioners is a steamy visual novel set aboard a colonization spacecraft. Awakened from cryosleep too soon, the protagonist faces isolation but decides to awaken others, sparking forbidden desires and intense encounters.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
